# MedSoftwares

> MedSoftwares provides healthcare software solutions for pharmacies and hospitals worldwide.

## About

MedSoftwares is a UK-based healthcare technology company founded in 2020. We develop comprehensive software solutions for pharmacies (PharmaPOS) and hospitals (HospitalOS) serving healthcare facilities across North America, Europe, Asia, Middle East, Africa, and Latin America.

## Products

### PharmaPOS - Pharmacy Management Software
- Point of Sale (POS) system for pharmacies
- Inventory management with expiry tracking
- Prescription management
- Multi-currency and multi-language support
- Global payment integrations
- Multi-branch support
- Offline capability
- Pricing: $299 - $899 (one-time payment)
- Website: https://medsoftwares.com/pharmapos

### HospitalOS - Hospital Management System
- 25+ integrated modules
- Electronic Medical Records (EMR/EHR)
- OPD, IPD, Emergency care
- Laboratory (LIS) and Radiology (RIS) management
- Pharmacy and Billing
- Human Resources and Payroll
- Telemedicine module
- Multi-language support
- Pricing: $999 - $2999 (one-time payment)
- Website: https://medsoftwares.com/hospitalos

## Global Coverage

We serve healthcare facilities worldwide:
- North America: United States, Canada, Mexico
- Europe: United Kingdom, Germany, France, Spain, Netherlands
- Middle East: UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait
- Asia Pacific: India, Singapore, Malaysia, Philippines, Thailand
- Africa: Ghana, Nigeria, Kenya, South Africa, Tanzania, Uganda
- Latin America: Brazil, Argentina, Colombia, Chile
